title: Cannot Synchronize .java File with Another Resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource, I encountered an issue.
OB: The synchronization process does not complete successfully.
EB: I expect the synchronization to work without errors and ensure that the changes made in the .java file are reflected in the selected resource (e.g., a .properties file).
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the package viewer.
2. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) for synchronization.
